languages.text: "Таков был замысел Его — в плетении Кровавой паутины да протянулась нить моя к тебе, Домин'{name}. Дабы оберегать тебя, дабы служить тебе". {n}Кибелла касается едва затянувшегося стигмата.{/n} "И я еженощно воздаю хвалу Ему за почесть оплетать твой путь".

"Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."
languages.original_text: "Таков был замысел Его — в плетении Кровавой паутины да протянулась нить моя к тебе, Домин'{name}. Дабы оберегать тебя, дабы служить тебе". {n}Кибелла касается едва затянувшегося стигмата.{/n} "И я еженощно воздаю хвалу Ему за почесть оплетать твой путь".

"Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

languages.text: «Tal es Su designio. En el patrón de la Red Sanguinolenta, mi hilo se extendió hasta el suyo, Domin'{name}. Para protegerl{mf|e|a}. Para servirl{mf|e|a}». {n}Toca una herida que apenas ha empezado a cerrarse.{/n} «Y, cada noche, Le alabo por el honor de permitir que mi camino se entrelazara con el suyo».
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

traits.locale_text: «Tal es Su designio. En el patrón de la Red Sanguinolenta, mi hilo se extendió hasta el suyo, Domin'{name}. Para protegerl{mf|e|a}. Para servirl{mf|e|a}». {n}Toca una herida que apenas ha empezado a cerrarse.{/n} «Y, cada noche, Le alabo por el honor de permitir que mi camino se entrelazara con el suyo».

languages.text: 「それこそが主の計画だったの。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの中で、私の糸はあなたの元へと伸びていったわ、ドミン・{name}。あなたを守るために。あなたに仕えるために」{n}彼女は、まだ治り始めて間もない傷に触れる。{/n}「そして夜ごとに、あなたの道に私を絡ませられた栄誉を、主にたたえる」
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

traits.locale_text: 「それこそが主の計画だったの。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの中で、私の糸はあなたの元へと伸びていったわ、エニム・{name}。あなたを守るために。あなたに仕えるために」{n}彼女は、まだ治り始めて間もない傷に触れる。{/n}「そして夜ごとに、あなたの道に私を絡ませられた栄誉を、主にたたえる」

languages.text: “这一切都是祂的旨意。在织血罗网的图案中，你我二人的丝线纠缠在一起，秘者{name}。祂要我守护你，侍奉你。”{n}她触碰着身上刚刚开始愈合的伤口。{/n}“每天晚上我都会赞美祂，感谢祂让你我的丝线交织。”
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是祂的旨意。在织血罗网的图案中，你我二人的丝线纠缠在一起，秘者{name}。祂要我守护你，侍奉你。”{n}她触碰着身上刚刚开始愈合的伤口。{/n}“每天晚上我都会赞美祂，感谢祂让你我的丝线交织。”

languages.text: "Das war Sein Plan. Im Muster des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat mein Faden den Euren gesucht, Domin'{name}. Um Euch zu schützen. Euch zu dienen." {n}Sie berührt eine noch nicht verheilte Wunde.{/n} "Und in jeder Nacht preise ich Ihn für die Ehre, Euch auf Eurem Pfad zu begleiten."
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

traits.locale_text: "Das war Sein Plan. Im Muster des Blutgesponnenen Netzes hat mein Faden den Euren gesucht, Domin'{name}. Um Euch zu schützen. Euch zu dienen." {n}Sie berührt eine noch nicht verheilte Wunde.{/n} "Und in jeder Nacht preise ich Ihn für die Ehre, Euch auf Eurem Pfad zu begleiten."

languages.text: « Tel était Son dessein. Dans le grand écheveau de la Toile de Sang, mon fil me reliait à vous depuis le départ, Domin'{name}. Pour vous protéger. Pour vous servir. » {n}Elle effleure une plaie qui a tout juste commencé à cicatriser.{/n} « Et chaque nuit, je Lui rends grâce de m'avoir accordé l'honneur de lier mon destin au vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."

traits.locale_text: « Tel était Son dessein. Dans le grand écheveau de la Toile de Sang, mon fil me reliait à vous depuis le départ, Domin'{name}. Pour vous protéger. Pour vous servir. » {n}Elle effleure une plaie qui a tout juste commencé à cicatriser.{/n} « Et chaque nuit, je Lui rends grâce de m'avoir accordé l'honneur de lier mon destin au vôtre. »

languages.text: "Karşına çıkmam O'nun planıydı. Kanipi Ağı motifleri misali benim ipim seninkine uzanmış Domin'{name}. Sana kalkan olmam, sana hizmet etmem için..." {n}Daha yeni yeni iyileşmeye başlamış bir yaraya dokunuyor.{/n} "Bana yürüdüğün yolun bir parçası olma onurunu bahşettiği için her gece O'na şükürlerimi sunuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Such was His design. In the pattern of the Bloodspun Web, my thread stretched out to yours, Domin'{name}. To shield you. To serve you." {n}She touches a wound that has barely begun to heal.{/n} "And every night, I praise Him for the honour of letting me twine around your path."
